feed.title: Google Cloud: Anthos clusters on AWS
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Anthos clusters on AWS

entry.content:
You can now launch clusters with the following Kubernetes versions. Click on the following links to see the release notes associated with these patches:

  • 1.32.4-gke.200
  • 1.31.7-gke.1000
  • 1.30.11-gke.800
entry.summary: New Kubernetes versions are now available for launch, including 1.32.4-gke.200, 1.31.7-gke.1000, and 1.30.11-gke.800. Release notes for each version are provided in the links.
entry.title: Announcement: New Kubernetes versions available

entry.content:
You can now launch clusters with the following Kubernetes versions. Click on the following links to see the release notes associated with these patches:

  • 1.31.6-gke.200
  • 1.30.10-gke.200
  • 1.29.14-gke.200
entry.summary: New versions of Kubernetes are now available for cluster launches, including 1.31.6-gke.200, 1.30.10-gke.200, and 1.29.14-gke.200. For more details on the release notes for these patches, please refer to the provided links.
entry.title: Announcement: New Kubernetes Versions Available
